dcterms:description: The ABIDE database aggregates data from different international acquisition sites and openly shares neuroimaging (functional MRI) and phenotypic data of 1112 subjects, aiming to separate healthy controls from patients suffering from Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD).
dcterms:title: ABIDE

dcterms:description: The ADNI database is the result of efforts from several academic and private co-investigators, recruiting over 1700 adults aged between 55 and 90 years, with the aim to predict conversion from Mild Cognitive Impairment (MCI) to Alzheimer's Disease.
dcterms:title: ADNI
